page.title: 08Rogart - Trade (Garage)
page.content: Mrs Sutherland has been running the local garage for six years. Her husband ran it for forty years before that. The garage repairs cars. It does welding, panel beating, respraying, mechanical repairs and is an M.O.T. Testing Station. They have many tools in the garage, including all the special eqipment required for M.O.T. testing. Three people are employed here. They sell petrol, diesel and Derv. Mrs Sutherland hires and drives vehicles. Daily she drives pupils to school in her mini-bus. The most exciting day in the garage's history was last year, when it went on fire. Fortunately, no-one was hurt.
